extensionDescription.message: Instant synchronised lyrics display in picture-in-picture window

popupMissMatch.description: The currently playing song was not found on the lyrics service.

popupMatchDescription.message: If your lyrics are not displayed or wrong, you can manually match(click) the correct track to reload the lyrics

optionsStrictMatchMode.message: Use strict match mode(artists need to match)

optionsShowCleanLyrics.message: Show clean lyrics(hide ads and other content)
